- manipulate package
```{r, eval=FALSE}
library(manipulate)

```

```{r}
manipulate(
  ggplot(data=diamonds, aes(x=carat)) + geom_histogram(binwidth=binselect),
binselect = slider(min=0.5,max=1,initial=0.7, step=0.01)
)

```
